definition: to accept delivery of goods/to pick up goods
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: BL is an essential document in international trade and shipment.
sentences.chinese: 提货单是国际贸易和船运中一种很重要的单据。

sentences.english: Highway transportation control receive a checkout pick-up document from the client.
sentences.chinese: 公路运输调度从客户处接出库提货单证。

sentences.english: The customer shows up to start the rental.
B: If I ordered a desk today, how would it be before I got delivery in Scotland?
sentences.chinese: 假如我今天预订一张办公桌，如何在苏格兰提货呢？

sentences.english: Did you get the bill of lading for you last shipment?
sentences.chinese: 你们收到前一批货的提货单了没有？

sentences.english: When taking delivery, we found that the cargo had been seriously wet by fresh water and putrefied.
sentences.chinese: 我们在提货时发现，货物遭受严重水湿，并已腐烂。

sentences.english: The goods don't match the bill of lading, something must have gone wrong.
sentences.chinese: 这些货物与提货单并不相符，一定是搞错了。

sentences.english: BL and draft belong to the same category?
sentences.chinese: 提货单和汇票属于同一范畴了？

sentences.english: Please see attached a copy of the Ocean bl for you.
sentences.chinese: 请看附件中的海运提货单副本。

sentences.english: As they are in such a damaged condition, we doubt we will be able to take delivery.
sentences.chinese: 由于它们残损如此严重，恐怕我们无法提货。

sentences.english: The user records each item as picked as the products are found in the warehouse.
sentences.chinese: 用户将仓库中有的产品对应的物品记录为已提货。

sentences.english: And cover three types of inspections in the bill of lading release white chapter.
sentences.chinese: 并在白色提货单上盖三检放行章。

sentences.english: Which description the carrier has no reasonable means of and is not part of the bill of lading.
sentences.chinese: 哪个描述载体没有合理的手段和不作为提货单的部分。

sentences.english: LCH, hoping all concerned client to pick up laden cargo at LCH.
sentences.chinese: 林查班港，希望相关客户改为在林查班码头提货。

sentences.english: Did you note the damage on the bill of lading?
sentences.chinese: 您把损坏情况注明在提货单上了没有？

sentences.english: If the consignee delays in taking delivery of the goods, the consignee shall pay storage and other fees to the carrier.
sentences.chinese: 收货人逾期提货的，应当向承运人支付保管费等费用。

definition: to order goods/to place an order
variant of 訂貨|订货[ding4 huo4]
to put together an order of goods
